credit_line: Museum purchase through gift of various donors and from Eleanor G. Hewitt Fund
title: Decoration of a panel
provenance: Ex collection: Piancastelli and Mrs. Edward D. Brandegee.
medium: Pen and brown ink, brush and brown wash
description:
Horizontal rectangle. A variation of 1901-39-1371. Below the medallion are bunches of ears of grain. Below, at right, a lamp. The altar at left is supported by standing birds. (RB '45)

Roundel with a vestal, for decoration over mirror, noble cabinet, Palazzo Altieri. (PDM '91)
name: Drawing
